  • Constructor Details

    • AuthManager

      public AuthManager()
      Creates a new AuthManager object

  • Method Details

    • getUsers

      public ArrayList<User> getUsers()
      Returns a list of all users that have been registered.
      Returns:
      a list of users

    • registerUser

      public void registerUser(String name, String password)
      Registers a new user with the given name and password.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the user to register
      password - the password for the user

    • login

      public void login(String name, String password)
      Logs in a user with the given name and password.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the user to log in
      password - the password for the user

    • logout

      public void logout()
      Logs out the current user by setting currUser to null. If there is no current user, does nothing.

    • isLoggedIn

      public boolean isLoggedIn()
      Checks if there is a currently logged-in user this can be checked if the currUser is not null meaning there is a current user.
      Returns:
      true if a user is logged in, false otherwise

    • getUser

      public User getUser()
      Returns the currently logged-in user. If there is no current user (i.e. isLoggedIn() is false), returns null.
      Returns:
      the currently logged-in user, or null if none

    • confirmPassword

      public boolean confirmPassword(String password)
      Prompts the user to confirm the given password by re-entering it. Continues to prompt until the entered password matches the given password.
      Parameters:
      password - the password to be confirmed
      Returns:
      true once the password is successfully confirmed
